ai-patthana8.3:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.3:1.1_0: Not rooted in thought, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.3:1.1_1: Not for the sake of a teaching, not for the sake of associated with thoughts,
ai-patthana8.3:1.1_2: Not wanting to have a cause or condition for the sake of a reason, nor because of the cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.3:2.1_0: Not for the sake of teaching Dhamma does not give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.3:2.1_1: Not for the sake of purification don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.3:2.1_2: thoughts that are associated with the cause and reasoned no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.3:3.1_0: Not for the sake of roots and not those associated with roots, not for the sake of a cause or condition. ...
ai-patthana8.3:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.3:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana8.3:4.1_2: or he is covered with loads of foes.
